title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 29, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 29, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary connect to discuss the potential for charges to come down against the Trump Organization and cover a story about a Memphis based rapper who has been arrested after cops used pictures from his Instagram feed against him. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
